data.name: Tenderfoot Tactics OST
data.detailed_description: Music from all four aspects of the game: the archipelago, the fog, the towns, and the battles. Since the battle music in the game is dynamic, the OST tracks are representative of the various battle environments. Otherwise it’s a complete collection.
data.about_the_game: Music from all four aspects of the game: the archipelago, the fog, the towns, and the battles. Since the battle music in the game is dynamic, the OST tracks are representative of the various battle environments. Otherwise it’s a complete collection.
data.short_description: Music from all four aspects of the game: the archipelago, the fog, the towns, and the battles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2 GB available space
